This topic describes how to edit individual model detailed fields in the Model Inventory. This is relevant for Model Owners who want to make model details are accurate and up to date in the Inventory. 

## Prerequisites

* You are a registered user on the ValidMind platform
* The model is already [registered in the model inventory](register-models.qmd)
* You are the Model Owner for the specific model you would like edit the details of, or an Administrator
* You are logged in to the ValidMind platform


## Steps

1. Navigate to the relevant Model Details page in the Model Inventory 
   - From ValidMind's home page, click on "Model Inventory" on the left-hand side bar
   - In the Model Inventory page, click on the relevant model entry to view the Model Details page

2. Use the "Edit" buttons to edit specific fields on the Model Details page 
   - Make the "Edit" button appear by hovering over a data field you would like to edit
   - Click on the "Edit" button to modify entries in each field

3. Click on "Done" to save edits when done 

**Note: the following fields cannot be edited:** 
- ID
- Model Validators
